articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Newspaper El Callao
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Newspaper El Callao
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Peruvian newspaper El Callao.
					 Abraham Ramirez Lituma, director general and editor-in-chief of the Peruvian newspaper, on a visit to the DPRK handed the gift over to an official concerned on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations Call for Accelerating Final Victory of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations Call for Accelerating Final Victory of Independent Reunification
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un clarified a new line and policies of national reunification to overcome the prevailing difficulties and comprehensively indicated the ways of implementing them at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 As soon as the new line and policies of national reunification were made public, they evoked a lively response.
					
					 This being a hard reality, only the south Korean authorities and a few other separatists dared make reckless remarks going against the trend of the times, chilling the hard-won atmosphere.
					
					 The DPRK government, political parties and organizations in a joint statement Monday clarified the following principled stand at home and abroad:
					
					 1. Everybody should wholeheartedly uphold the line and policies of independent reunification set forth by the peerlessly great man out of ardent patriotism.
					
					 They comprehensively deal with the principle of national independence, the principle of the great national unity and the ways of ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and realizing the federal formula acceptable to everybody in the north and the south, and all other theoretical and practical issues which the Korean nation has sought at the cost of blood and whose truth has been proved in practice in the course of the arduous and protracted struggle for national reunification.
					
					 If all Koreans adhere to and carry out the line and policies, they can smoothly attain the goal of reunification, their desire, but if they fail to do so, they will neither be able to get rid of the permanent division and danger of a war nor escape from self-destruction in the long run.
					
					 If they have a true will to solve the issue of national reunification, everyone should not turn a deaf ear to the stark truth of history but sympathize and absolutely support the new line of national reunification. 
					
					 If the fair and reasonable line and policies for national reunification which the entire nation supports and all people welcome are criticized and denied categorically, there will be nothing to be done any more between the north and the south.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities come out with any proposal from the stand of national independence and great national unity, we will candidly discuss it, though our new Juche-oriented line and policies are the most just and fair and aboveboard offer for reunification. This is our stand.
					
					 The government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK will make responsible efforts to implement the line and policies for independent reunification set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK, holding fast to them as a unique and supreme reunification programme of the nation, and take initiatives for necessary practical measures.
					
					 2. The Koreans in the north and the south and abroad are called upon to dynamically turn out in the general offensive towards the final victory of national reunification full of conviction. 
					
					 The new line of independent reunification serves as a bright blueprint for building a reunified power based on a high sense of self-confidence in the strength of the nation and ardent love and trust in all Koreans.
					
					 Whoever was born on this land should turn out courageously in the general advance for national reunification, the greatest task of the nation, irrespective of ideology, political view and religious belief, from the steadfast viewpoint and stand to solve all problems in reliance upon the nation in its interests. 
					
					 If all the 80 million Koreans lay even a small stepping stone for national reconciliation and unity by rooting out even a single source of confrontation and antagonism lying in the way of national reunification, instead of paying lip-service to reunification and patriotism, Korea's reunification will be hastened so much.
					
					 Let us unhesitatingly join hands with anyone without asking about his or her past if he or she has even a shred of national conscience though he or she has taken the road of opposing reunification so far, and follow the road of reunification and patriotism together. This is the true meaning of the idea of great national unity and the idea of By Our Nation Itself advocated by the DPRK.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities make an offer favorable for the great national unity based on the true spirit of independence, the DPRK is also willing to push ahead with it.
					
					 No one can block the Korean nation from dashing forward like the wind single-mindedly toward the rosy future of national reunification and prosperity.
					
					 3. The south Korean authorities should face up to our will and efforts for improving the north-south relations and bringing earlier national reunification and take responsible and reasonable option at the present crucial turning point.
					
					 We broadmindedly put forward once again true practical ways to improve the north-south relations, putting aside everything despite heinous confrontation moves to bring down our ideology and social system as we view a single step at present to decide the future of national reunification as crucial.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities recklessly chill the enthusiasm of people at home and abroad, categorically slandering and insulting the generosity and goodwill of the compatriots, claiming that "peace offensive without denuclearization is meaningless" and "the north's proposal is insincere camouflaged offensive."
					
					 They went the lengths of reeling off a litany of extremely impolite and provocative outbursts that the north's sincere call and proposal is nothing but an artifice to "create discord in the south" and scuttle the "international cooperation" and "it is necessary to escalate international sanctions and pressure on the north till it dismantles nukes."
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes has, in fact, nothing to do with the north-south relations. The more desperately the south Korean authorities mix the north-south relations with the nuclear issue, the deeper quagmire they will find themselves in. 
					
					 Now the position and role of the DPRK have dramatically changed and its status as a nuclear weapons state remains steadfast no matter who recognizes it or not.
					
					 The trend of the situation on the Korean peninsula and in the region depends on our will and determination and the prospect of the north-south relations is also related to this.
					
					 As we have already clarified, there are peaceful and non-peaceful ways for national reunification and we are fully ready for both ways.
					
					 Although there are still a lot of difficulties and ordeals in the way of national reunification, nothing can block the dynamic advance of the Koreans dashing ahead like the wind for building a reunified power, staking it on the nation's dignity and honor.
					
					 We will win the final victory in the struggle for national reunification and build without fail a dignified and prosperous reunified power, an envy of the world, on this land true to the wise leadership of peerless patriot Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Peruvian General Federation of Workers headed by executive member Leopoldo Ortiz Centty, general secretary of the Port Trade Union, Monday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Seventh Congress of WPK Celebrated in More Provinces
articles.content:
Seventh Congress of WPK Celebrated in More Provinces
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- There took place mass rallies in South and North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces on Monday to celebrate the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were officials, working people, youth and students of the party, power and economic bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities in the provinces.
					
					 Speakers said that the Seventh Congress of the WPK was the glorious one of victors which made a new watershed in the struggle to strengthen the party and accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK at its historic Seventh Congress was an expression of ardent loyalty and absolute trust of all the service personnel and people in him and a great revolutionary event guaranteeing the everlasting prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 They called for holding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Juche, implementing to the last their behests and upholding the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un with loyalty.
					
					 They called upon all officials, party members and other people to make the flames of the Mallima speed campaign rage furiously in the same spirit as that displayed by them in the 70-day campaign of loyalty and thus thoroughly carry out the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Then followed mass demonstrations.

articles.title: Measuring Instruments for Environment Protection Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Measuring Instruments for Environment Protection Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The Environmental Science and Technology Institute under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection in the DPRK has recently developed 40-odd instruments of four kinds for scientific observation of environmental conditions.
					 According to Ri Song Il, a section chief of the Institute, the newly-developed instruments are latest ones which guarantees the scientific accuracy in monitoring and observing water and air conditions.
					
					 In particular, floating dust meter is of great significance in putting the real-time monitoring system for aerial environment on a higher scientific basis.
					
					 Among those instruments are air sampler and colorimeter for environmental analysis which are helpful to correctly measuring the density of dust and gas and the degree of waste water from industrial establishments.

articles.title: Dance Suite "Our Golden Country" Created in DPRK
articles.content:
Dance Suite "Our Golden Country" Created in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The National Folk Art Troupe in the DPRK recently produced dance suite "Our Golden Country".
					 The dance suite, made up of prologue, three acts and epilogue, tells about the wise leadership and devoted efforts made by the peerlessly great persons to turn the whole country into golden mountains and fields and usher in a new history of golden sea.
					
					 Duet dance "Changsong Is an Earthly Paradise" and solo dance "In a Transformed Plain" represent the optimistic life of working people in Changsong County who have turned the mountains around their hometown into golden and treasure ones, true to President Kim Il Sung's teaching that it is needed to make good use of the mountains in mountainous areas, and peasants in Handre Plain which underwent a cataclysmic change under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The suite also includes male group dance "Whistle of Fishing Vessel Tanphung (autumn tints)", mixed group dance "It's Good to See Golden Mountains" and song and dance "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass".
					
					 They impressively show the stirring reality of the country which makes a new history of changes under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The National Folk Art Troupe, founded in October Juche 36 (1947), is a veteran troupe in the country, which gave a deep impression on the citizens by creating a folk dance suite "People in the Walled City of Pyongyang" in the late 1990's.

articles.title: Iridescent Paint Production Process Established
articles.content:
Iridescent Paint Production Process Established
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The Ryujong Technological Exchange Company in the DPRK has set up a process of producing iridescent paints with locally available materials.
					 According to Kim Ryong Jin, director of the company, told KCNA:
					
					 My company began mass-producing iridescent paints with domestic materials, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of increasing the proportion of locally available finishing building materials.
					
					 The paints have been applied to different projects like the Central Zoo.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on May 14 to celebrate Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Placed at the exhibition hall were photos of Kim Jong Un who was elected chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the Seventh Congress of the WPK and celebrations including the Pyongyang mass rally and public procession for celebrating the congress.
					
					 Chairman Ho Jong Man, Vice-Chairmen Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju and advisors of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and its department directors and leading officials of its organizations and enterprises and chairpersons of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area went round the exhibition hall.
					
					 They were admired at the proud appearance of the people in the homeland who glorified the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the one of victors and demonstrated to the world the spirit and might of the single-minded unity of Juche Korea, rallied close around the peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms May 16 Military Coup Criminal
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms May 16 Military Coup Criminal
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The military coup staged by Park Chung-Hee in south Korea on May 16, 1961 was an unpardonable criminal incident orchestrated by the U.S. in which the south Korean military hooligans seized power by ruthlessly trampling down at the point of the bayonet the democracy which sprouted in the wake of the April 19 Popular Uprising, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the desire of the south Korean people to live in a democratic society free from outside forces and fascist dictatorship.
					
					 The south Korean people, therefore, waged a strenuous struggle against the U.S. military occupation and colonial rule and traitor Syngman Rhee's dictatorial rule. Their anti-U.S., anti-dictatorship struggle for independence and democracy reached the climax with the popular uprising in April, 1960 as a momentum.
					
					 The Syngman Rhee dictatorial regime was overthrown by the ardent desire of the south Koreans for independence, democracy and national reunification and their persevering resistance.
					
					 The U.S., however, instigated Park Chung-Hee, another lackey of the U.S. and military fascist gangster, to stage a military coup in a bid to bring the crisis of its colonial rule in south Korea under control and thoroughly fascistize its society.
					
					 Park's bloody military dictatorial rule that kicked off through the May 16 military coup was a horrible tragedy of history as it turned south Korea into a theatre of fascist rowdyism and a tundra of human rights and democracy.
					
					 Many years have passed since the fall of the "yusin" dictatorial rule in south Korea, but its people see the departed soul of "yusin" dictatorship haunting its whole society.
					
					 The fascist rule of the present chief executive is bound to come to an end in face of the powerful struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and national reunification just as the "yusin" dictatorship met a miserable end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Moves to Increase Capability for Preemptive Attack upon DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Moves to Increase Capability for Preemptive Attack upon DPRK
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are mulling deploying four transport planes for special infiltration until next year, while seeking to secretly introduce special warfare forces and equipment in a bid to make a "surprise preemptive attack" upon the nuclear and missile facilities of the DPRK. 
					 Meanwhile, they disclosed their intention to gradually introduce four ships supporting a special warfare for naval infiltration and 20 special infiltration crafts from 2020 while talking about operation for "disabling nuclear and missile facilities."
					
					 They are also mulling introducing global hawk while trumpeting about the "quick detection" of signs of "nuclear and missile provocations".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary denounces this as an impudent provocation to bolster up the capability for a preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the south Korean ruling forces do not want detente and peace on the Korean peninsula and stability in Northeast Asia but work hard to lead the situation to an extreme phase of a nuclear war, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The DPRK has stood for the peace and security on the peninsula and made positive efforts to achieve them.
					
					 But, the south Korean warmongers have resorted to military provocations while challenging the DPRK's will to preserve peace.
					
					 It is not hard to guess the consequences to be entailed by them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should drop a foolish daydream and stop at once reckless provocations to escalate the tension and ignite a nuclear war.

articles.title: Opposition to Chief Executive Surges in South Korea
articles.content:
Opposition to Chief Executive Surges in South Korea
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Opposition to the present chief executive is steadily mounting in south Korea, according to Kukmin Ilbo of south Korea on May 13.
					According to the results of the opinion poll conducted among 1,005 adults across south Korea from May 10 to 12 on the chief executive's administration of state affairs, their support rate for her drastically declined whereas the rate of negative assessment further rose.
					
					 Most of the respondents chided the chief executive's economy policy, lack of understanding of the people, self-complacency and self-centered judgment.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Slams Authorities' Anti-labor Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Slams Authorities' Anti-labor Policy
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued a statement on May 12 to denounce the authorities' anti-labor policy.
					 The statement accused the minister of Employment and Labor of holding a press conference that day at which he underlined the need to reform the wage system into one based on piece rate, talking about legal duty.
					
					 It censured the regime for illegally and coercibly demanding public organs introduce the wage system based on piece rate.
					
					 Lurking behind this is a scenario to cut down wages of individual workers and disable trade unions, it charged.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Accused of Hindering Probe Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Accused of Hindering Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "Saenuri Party" is blocking the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, according to south Korean CBS.
					 A session of the "National Assembly" (NA) for extending the period of activities of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster proved abortive on May 10 due to the boycott of lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party." This made it difficult to clear the motion calling for the revision of the special law on ferry Sewol within the 19th NA.
					
					 After being sternly punished by the people's mindset at the 20th "National Assembly" election, the present chief executive and the "Saenuri Party" are doggedly opposing the demand of the people for extending and intensifying the activities of the said Ad Hoc Committee by revising the special law on ferry Sewol.

articles.title: Celebration Events Take Place in Russia
articles.content:
Celebration Events Take Place in Russia
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Vladivostok and seminar in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia on May 10 in celebration of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were personages of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism, the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia and the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 The acting first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK was a special historical event for the Korean people and the close friends of the DPRK.
					
					 Brighter is the future of the DPRK as Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the WPK, he stressed.
					
					 The director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK makes it possible for it to dynamically advance toward the final victory of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: KPA Lauded by International Body
articles.content:
KPA Lauded by International Body
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted an article titled "Leader's army" on its website One Corea Network on April 24, illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The article praised Kim Il Sung, founder of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and legendary hero, for advancing the Juche-based military idea and successfully applying it, defeating the Japanese imperialists and achieving the historic cause of Korea's liberation, beating back the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world for the first time in history and honorably protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 It noted that leader Kim Jong Il, faithful successor to the cause of Kim Il Sung, trained all service personnel to be strong in idea and faith and led the struggle for defending socialism to victory in the 1990s under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The KPA has demonstrated its might to the whole world as the leader's army fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique under the leadership of supreme commander Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, it noted, adding:
					
					 The KPA will always demonstrate its invincible might under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, peerlessly brilliant commander.

articles.title: Danish Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Inaugurated
articles.content:
Danish Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Inaugurated
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- A Danish preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Copenhagen recently.
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the significant days next year such as the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung) and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il).

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Malta
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Malta
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- A Maltese preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed.
					 Jean-Pierre, secretary general of the Malta-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the said meeting.

articles.title: Koreans in Uzbekistan Meet
articles.content:
Koreans in Uzbekistan Meet
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- The "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan sponsored a meeting at the DPRK embassy in Tashkent on May 10 in celebration of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election to the chairmanship of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants presented a floral basket and bouquets before the photo of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Chairman of the association Ju Yong Il said in a speech that Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the WPK was a manifestation of unanimous will and desire of the people in the homeland.
					
					 We will turn out as one in the sacred cause of national reunification with the pride and honor of having Kim Jong Un at the helm of the Korean revolution, Ju noted.
					
					 He called for actively turning out in the work for national reunification and prosperity though they are far away from the homeland, keeping in mind that implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is the way of accelerating national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Koreans in Kyrgyzstan Meet
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting for celebrating supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place at the Korean Center in Bishkek on May 10 under the sponsorship of the United Confederation of Korean s in Kyrgyzstan.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos dealing with revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos of Kim Jong Un giving field guidance to units of the Korean People's Army and various fields of the national economy.
					
					 Photos showing the DPRK's development were on display.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Chairman of the confederation Pak Kyong Ho said that Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 The prosperity and future of the socialist country are bright as Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great leaders is standing at the helm of the Korean revolution, he noted.
					
					 He called for more dynamically conducting the patriotic movement for the prosperity of the country and its reunification with the pride and honor of being overseas citizens of the socialist motherland led by the great leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Italy
Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea at a printing office on May 5 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work is the speech made by him at the military parade held in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012). It clarifies that the century-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that outstanding leader guarantees the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to exalt the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion de G. A. Zhuganov
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion de G. A. Zhuganov
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10 G. A. Zhuganov, Presidente del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Estimado camarada Kim Jong Un:
					
					Le hago llegar mi sincera felicitacion por el hecho de que Vd. se haya electo en el cargo supremo de Presidente del PTC.
					
					Expreso mi conviccion de que el PTC encabezado por Vd. dirigira invariablemente al pueblo coreano por el unico camino hacia la construccion de la sociedad socialista prospera.
					
					Deseo a Vd. grandes exitos en sus labores creativas para el bienestar del pais y el pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de diario peruano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de diario peruano
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dirigiera el diario peruano El Callao.
					El director-gerente general del diario, Abraham Ramirez Lituma, de visita en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lo entrego el dia 16 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Hay que cuestionar crimen antietico de Sur de Corea, demanda MINREX
articles.content:
Hay que cuestionar crimen antietico de Sur de Corea, demanda MINREX
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada el dia 15 en relacion con que no se soluciona el caso de secuestro colectivo de las autoridades surcoreanas contra las civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio como lo siguiente:
					Como ya esta conocido por todos, a principios de abril las autoridades surcoreanas enloquecidas en los complots anti-RPDC se llevaron en plena luz en colectivo al Sur de Corea a las ciudadanas de la RPDC en Ningbo de la provincia de Zhejiang de China movilizando a los gangsteres del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Esto es una violacion abierta contra la dignidad y el Poder de la RPDC, una grave provocacion politica intolerable que promueve la confrontacion y la agravacion de la tension entre ambas partes coreanas y un crimen de categoria especial sin precedente que violo los derechos humanos de las ciudadanas de la RPDC.
					
					Tan pronto como surgio el incidente, la RPDC denuncio categoricamente tales acciones bestiales de los titeres surcoreanos y exigio fuertemente a las autoridades surcoreanas  devolver pronta e incondicionalmente las ciudadanas secuestradas y tomar de inmediato las medidas practicas para que los padres de las victimas se reunan en Seul con sus hijas.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas no aceptaron las basicas demandas humanitarias de los padres de las secuestradas, sino las encarcelaron en las celdas individuales bloqueando todos los contactos posibles con la prensa. Y pronuncian solo la "fuga voluntaria del Norte".
					
					Esta actitud inhumanitaria de las autoridades surcoreanas deviene el crimen antietico que niega hasta los mas basicos derechos estipulados en la Declaracion Mundial de Derechos Humanos y los acuerdos internacionales de DDHH
					
					La realidad comprueba patentemente que las autoridades surcoreanas, quienes detienen por la fuerza a las ciudadanas de la RPDC en lugar de responder a las propuestas bondadosas y generosas para la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur declaradas por esta en el VII Congreso del PTC, son autores de la violacion de DDHH y constituyen el colectivo de traidores a la nacion sin rivales en este mundo.
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que Estados Unidos y el Occidente, que antes hablaban tanto del "fomento de la proteccion de DDHH" y cuestionaban sin ton ni son los problemas de DDHH de otros paises, guardan silencio absoluto ante la violacion de DDHH sistematica del Sur de Corea como el reciente secuestro colectivo contra las ciudadanas de la RPDC.
					
					Los familiares de las secuestradas ya remitieron por separado al alto comisionado de la ONU para los derechos humanos y al presidente del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU las cartas que acusan los actos criminales de las autoridades surcoreanas y demandan las medidas urgentes.
					
					La ONU y las organizaciones internacionales de DDHH deben tener presente de que su actitud sobre el presenta caso sirve de una piedra de toque que determina la verdad y falsedad del "fomento de proteccion de DDHH" de que hablan ellos mismos, cuestionar merecidamente los crimenes antieticos de las autoridades surcoreanas y tomar las medidas necesarias a devolver lo mas pronto posible las ciudadanas de la RPDC al regazo de sus padres.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines multitudinarios en provincias
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines multitudinarios en provincias
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 16 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte, de Hwanghae del Norte y de Kangwon los mitines multitudinarios para felicitar el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, respectivamente.
					Asistieron ahi los funcionarios de los organismos locales del partido, el poder y la economia, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades y otras unidades, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de respectivas localidades.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el VII Congreso del PTC fue el conclave de victoria y gloria que deviene nuevo punto de viraje en la lucha por fortalecer mas el partido y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche enarbolando la bandera de la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					Subrayaron que la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del PTC en el historico Congreso deviene la expresion de la noble fidelidad y la absoluta confianza de todos los militares y civiles en el Mariscal y es el gran evento revolucionario que garantiza la eternidad de la patria y la nacion.
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de materializar hasta el fin los legados de los grandes Lideres y apoyar fielmente la idea y la direccion del Mariscal enalteciendo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il como eterno Sol del Juche.
					
					Apuntaron que todos los funcionarios, militantes y trabajadores deben materializar cabalmente la resolucion del VII Congreso al avivar las llamaradas del movimiento por crear la velocidad de Mallima con el espiritu y el impetu manifestados en la campana de 70 dias de la fidelidad.
					
					A continuacion, se efectuaron las manifestaciones multitudinarias.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion detallada sobre efectuacion exitosa de VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion detallada sobre efectuacion exitosa de VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 16 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) publico el dia 14 la informacion detallada referida a que el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea se realizo como conclave de victoria y gloria al alcanzar su objetivo gracias a la fidelidad y confianza de todos los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y los demas civiles.
					Segun ella, el VII Congreso del PTC eligio al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del PTC y presento un gran programa para la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, asi que fue una gran reunion mas significativa en la lucha por llevar a feliz termino la gran empresa del Paektu bajo la bandera de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					La victoria brillante del VII Congreso del PTC se debe a la direccion del Mariscal.
					
					El 30 de octubre del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche, el Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC decidio convocar su VII Congreso en reflejo de la demanda del Partido y de la Revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Informados de esta noticia, los militares y civiles coreanos se han levantado como un solo hombre para glorificar el VII Congreso del PTC como epoca dorada de la Revolucion.
					
					En febrero de 2016 se publicaron las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido y se emitio la carta del CC del PTC dirigida a todos los militantes del partido. Todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo se movilizaron en la campana de 70 dias respondiendo al llamamiento del CC del PTC de acoger el Congreso con maximos exitos y meritos laborales.
					
					En los sectores importantes tales como el de electricidad, carbon, metalurgia, mecanica, industria ligera, agricultura, construccion, investigacion cientifica y deporte, nacieron las unidades prototipos por la ofensiva general, se libro por doquier las campanas para alcanzar y aprender las unidades ejemplares e intercambiar entre si las experiencias y asi, se anotaron los exitos sorprendentes, regalos dirigidos al congreso, en el registro de la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad.
					
					En visperas del VII Congreso del PTC se realizaron las conferencias del PTC en las provincias, ciudades y distritos.
					
					La conferencia del Ejercito Popular de Corea del PTC efectuada los dias 12 y 13 de abril, eligio al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un como delegado del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Tambien en las conferencias provinciales del PTC se adopto por unanimidad la decision de elegirle como delegado del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Tambien hicieron balance del curso despues del VI Congreso del PTC, eligieron nuevos organos de direccion del partido y eligieron y recomendaron a los funcionarios y miembros del partido como delegados y observadores del VII Congreso.
					
					Se hizo publica la resolucion del BP del CC del PTC de abrir el 6 de mayo en esta capital el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					El 2 de mayo, arribaron a Pyongyang los participantes en el Congreso con sus exitos en la campana de 70 dias.
					
					Los participantes visitaron la colina Mansu para rendir tributo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar un cesto de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce. Tambien hicieron lo mismo en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, lugar sagrado del Juche en que estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado y los funcionarios de los organos del partido y las fuerzas armadas visitaron la residencia de los participantes en el congreso para felicitarles.
					
					En esta capital, se inauguraron la exposicion nacional de fotos y la central de bellas artes con motivo del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					En ocasion del congreso, el Mariscal recibio mensajes y cartas de felicitacion, cestos de flores, regalos, medallas, titulos honorificos y diplomas que le enviaran los jefes del partido y el Estado de varios paises, partidos politicos, entidades, organizaciones de estudio de la Idea Juche, las personalidades de diversos estratos, los cuerpos de diplomaticos, agregados militares y consejeros economicos y comerciales, los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en la RPDC.
					
					Al VII Congreso y al CC, del PTC, hicieron llegar los mensajes, cartas y cestos de flores de felicitacion varios partidos politicos, jefes de partidos, las entidades de amistad y solidaridad, las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche y las personalidades de diversos estratos.
					
					El 6 de mayo se inauguro con solemnidad el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal pronuncio las palabras de inauguracion.
					
					Segun la propuesta del Mariscal, todos los participantes en el Congreso guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, martires patrioticos, funcionarios, trabajadores y personajes patrioticos por la reunificacion.
					
					El congreso eligio al Mariscal en la presidencia.
					
					Se dio lectura a los mensajes de felicitacion que le enviaran el Presidium del CC de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China y se entregaron con cortesia los banderines de felicitacion.
					
					El congreso dio a conocer que al Mariscal enviaron un mensaje y banderin de felicitacion el CC del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista (FDNA) y al congreso los hicieron llegar el CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea y el CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U.
					
					El congreso envio un mensaje de felicitacion a los oficiales y soldados del EPC y Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los trabajadores y funcionarios de las instituciones, fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas.
					
					El Mariscal presento el informe sobre las labores del CC del Partido.
					
					Acto seguido hubo intervenciones para cumplir cabalmente las tareas programaticas presentadas en el informe del Mariscal.
					
					En la tercera jornada del congreso, el Marcial pronuncio las palabras de conclusion, ocasion en la cual aclaro los asuntos que surgen en cumplir las tareas presentadas en el informe sobre las labores del CC del Partido y presento la consigna combativa "!Avancemos vigorosamente todo el partido,  ejercito y pueblo para materializar las tareas del VII Congreso y anticipemos la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche!"
					
					En el congreso, se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion dirigido al conclave por todos los oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y el pueblo, y fue aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre el "Balance de las albores del CC del PTC".
					
					Al Mariscal ofrecieron cestos de flores los grupos de felicitacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea y la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					
					En el Congreso se acordo la resolucion sobre la enmienda de los "estatutos del PTC".
					
					El dia 9 el Congreso eligio al Mariscal como Presidente del PTC.
					
					Segun los estatutos del PTC y el reglamento detallado de las elecciones del organo directivo supremo del PTC, el conclave proclamo que el Mariscal fue electo como miembro del Comite Central del Partido, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido, miembro del Presidium del BP y presidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido.
					
					El primer pleno del septimo periodo del CC del PTC eligio el Presidium del BP y el BP, del CC del PTC y organizo el Consejo Politico Ejecutivo y la Comision Militar Central del Partido, encabezados por el Mariscal.
					
					Se publico el llamamiento del VII Congreso del PTC dirigido a todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, los jovenes y los habitantes "!Adelante con la ofensiva general hacia la victoria total del socialismo avivando las llamas de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima!"
					
					El Mariscal pronuncio las palabras de clausura del conclave.
					
					El congreso presento la alta meta y programas de la lucha para la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					El dia 10 tuvieron lugar en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin y manifestacion multitudinarios de la ciudad de Pyongyang y el desfile con antorcha de los vanguardistas juveniles y el dia 11, la funcion conjunta de la Banda Moranbong, la Chongbong y el Coro Estatal Benemerito "Seguiremos para siempre al Partido", para felicitar el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con los participantes en el Congreso.
					
					Se ofrecieron los banquetes en la Casa Mokran, el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo, el Restaurante Okryu, el Restaurante Chongryu, el Restaurante de Fideo de Pyongyang, el Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang, el Hotel Internacional Yanggakdo, el barco de servicio combinado Mujigae y el barco restaurante Taedonggang.
					
					Los participantes en el Congreso visitaron Mangyongdae, el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong, el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Museo del Movimiento Juvenil, el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas, etc. y dieron recorrido por la exposicion de maquinas y equipos elaborados como regalo al Congreso.
					
					Se Efectuo el cursillo para los participantes en el Congreso.
					
					Los participantes sostuvieron un encuentro para adoptar el juramento al Mariscal.
